title: Is it possible that the apostle Paul was shipwrecked very close to the same island that John was imprisoned on Patmos? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. Patmos is off the coast of Turkey, near the city of Ephesus. Paul was shipwrecked at Malta — which is just south of Sicily and quite a distance away.

According to the Book of Acts, Paul was shipwrecked on Malta, and as you say, John was imprisoned on Patmos. Malta is an island in the Mediterranean Sea, just south of Italy, and Patmos is an island just off the coast of Turkey. The distance between the two islands is about 1,000 kilometres.
